file.name: spec.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Linode API
  description: |
    Test API schema
servers:
- url: https://api.linode.com/v4
tags:
- name: Account
  description: Test tag
paths:
  /account:
    post:
      tags:
      - Account
      summary: Test Endpoint
      description: This is only a test
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              description: "Root"
              allOf:
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExampleTwo'
              - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExampleThree'
              required:
                - required_in_root
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success!
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
  /oneof:
    post:
      tags:
      - OneOf
      summary: Test Endpoint 2
      description: This is only a test
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
                  x-linode-ref-meta:
                      '#/components/schemas/ExampleOneOfOne':
                        name: Example One of One
                      '#/components/schemas/ExampleOneOfTwo':
                        name: Example One of Two!!
                  type: object
                  properties:
                    data:
                      type: object
                      oneOf:
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExampleOneOfOne'
                        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExampleOneOfTwo'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success!
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
components:
  schemas:
    ExampleOne:
      description: "Example One"
      type: object
      properties:
        test1:
          type: string
          description: test 1 (required)
      required:
      - test1
    ExampleTwo:
      description: "Example Two"
      properties:
        required_in_root:
          type: string
          description: required_in_root (required)
      allOf:
      - $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExampleOne'
      - type: object
        description: "Type Object"
        properties:
          test2:
            type: string
            description: test 2 (required)
        required:
        - test2
    ExampleThree:
      description: "Example Three"
      type: object
      properties:
        test3:
          type: object
          description: test 3 (required)
          properties:
            test1:
              type: string
              description: test 1 (optional)
            test4:
              type: string
              description: test 4 (required)
            required_in_root:
              type: string
              description: required_in_root (optional)
          required:
            - test4
      required:
        - test3

    ExampleOneOfOne:
      description: "Example OneOfOne"
      type: object
      properties:
        test1:
          type: string
          description: test 1 in oneOf (optional)
    ExampleOneOfTwo:
      description: "Example OneOfOne"
      type: object
      properties:
        test1:
          type: string
          description: test 1 in oneOf (required)
        test2:
          type: string
          description: test 2 in oneOf (optional)
      required:
        - test1

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/account": post: requestBody: contents: media: "application/json": generate schema: allOf: schema type mismatch:  and object
